MaterialityMatrixScore.name: MaterialityMatrixScore
MaterialityMatrixScore.description: Represents the materiality matrix score used to visualize all the data gathered through materiality assessment intake process.

CalculatedDate.description: Time in which the record was last calculated, should be generally equal to Update Date.

InwardImpactScore.description: The topic impact score for the company that conducts the materiality assessment.

IsTopicRelevant.description: Indicates whether the topic is materially relevant for the company (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaterialityAsmtTopicId.description: The materiality assessment topic associated with the matrix.

MaterialityAssessmentId.description: The materiality assessment associated with the matrix.

Name.description: The name of the materiality matrix score.

OutwardImpactScore.description: The topic impact score for the stakeholder interested in the materiality assessment conducted by the company.
